idea: We specialize in rendering the superlative turnkey recruiting in the fields of BPO, finance, engineering, sales & marketing, FMCG, Telecom/ Technology/ ISP, manufacturing/operations, Export/ Import, IT/ ITES, retail, construction, tour & travel, automobile, and the technical field in Pan India. idea:
utelage Professional is a leading business consulting organization with its office in Navi Mumbai, India. A venture of V4C Group managed and promoted by team of experts from diverse background. We help Corporate in addressing their premeditated issues by providing pragmatic implementable solutions for a sustainable triumph they aspire.

Our dedicated team service major areas in Finance, Legal, HR & Business advisory to harness better strategies, process, transformation, innovation by using deep industry knowledge and expertise for high impact results. We believe, Finding success in this busy and fast paced industry it is necessary to scale up the business and processes. We perform measurement of the current organization and design solutions that optimize to further supporting the business objective.
name: TUTELAGE PROFESSIONALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Provide IT Consulting, IT Infra. Support & IT Staffing services to other IT & non-IT Enterprises at a very affordable as well as competitive pricing.

Differing from more technology-oriented IT management approaches like network management and IT systems management,IT service management is characterized by adopting a process approach towards management, focusing on customer needs and IT services for customers rather than IT systems, and stressing continual improvement.
name: AEROVITE TECHNOLOGIES LLP

name: MOBILITY GLOBAL INC

idea:
Allied Coworks has embarked on an exciting journey of leading-edge environs that feeds to a complete range from start-ups to entrepreneur dens. Allied Coworks is the brainchild of Allied Digital, publicly listed on the BSE since (year), an IT hotbed that is seasoned with 30 years of digital expertise. Driven by its mantra of “success breeds more success”, Allied Digital has raised a community of thinkers, achievers and innovators. Allied Coworks is now aimed to create a benchmark in the region of co-working space that is not just an office space. You will discover new connections, built networks and raise breed on collaboration all within a fun-loving atmosphere and convenience at its best.
One person on an average spends 90,000 hours at work in a lifetime. Coworking is so much more than simply shared office space. Here is a friendly and vibrant place where like-minded individuals can connect and collaborate to grow. We hold the vision to empower positivity and inspiration for small businesses with big dreams.
It's a place where people and programs help you and your business grow. We are passionate about creating communities of talented, interesting and clever humans that are following their passions. We welcome all ambitious professionals and entrepreneurs who are looking for a place for their ideas and organisations to thrive.
Come and see our spaces for yourself, and see the difference!
name: ALLIED DIGITAL COWORKS PRIVATE LIMITED
